title: Qualified for my series yesterday, log on and no series to be found
body: I qualified for my series yesterday, and today I log on and i'm 97lp, which I was at before I won the game to put me into series. rito pls

replies.body: yeah, turns out another 'bug' also dodged me out of a queue so i lost. fucking riot.

Hey Feathand, 

This looks like it's a display bug! Our systems show you are currently 1 Win 1 loss in your placement matches! Good luck!
